google_translated: · "I can not reach" \ N

en_text: What purpose do they serve, these useless wings of mine?
jp_text: ・「役立たずの　この翼」\N
google_translated: · "This wing of useless wing" \ N

en_text: All I can do is smile by your side.
jp_text: ・「わたしにできること」\N
google_translated: · "What I can do" \ N

en_text: I wonder if it's okay to only warm your heart
jp_text: ・「せめて　つつみたい」\N
google_translated: · "I want to do it" \ N

en_text: And now, I am able to smile.
jp_text: ・「今こそわたし　笑うよ」\N
google_translated: · "I will laugh now" \ N
